name: Classic Croque Monsieur
description: Savor the timeless flavors of our Classic Croque Monsieur, featuring premium Black Forest ham, melted Gruyère cheese, and a generous layer of creamy béchamel sauce, all nestled between two slices of crispy, golden sourdough bread.

name: Croque Madame
description: Elevate your croque monsieur experience with our delightful Croque Madame, which adds a perfectly fried egg on top of the classic combination of Black Forest ham, melted Gruyère cheese, and rich béchamel sauce, served on toasted sourdough bread.

name: Croque Provencal
description: Escape to the French countryside with our Croque Provencal, a refreshing twist on the classic croque monsieur. Enjoy the vibrant flavors of ripe tomatoes and fresh basil, complementing the traditional Black Forest ham, Gruyère cheese, and béchamel sauce.

name: Croque Auvergnat
description: Indulge in the bold taste of our Croque Auvergnat, which swaps traditional Gruyère for tangy blue cheese and combines it with smoked turkey and sweet caramelized onions, all smothered in béchamel sauce and served on toasted sourdough bread.

name: Croque Forestier
description: For a vegetarian-friendly option, try our Croque Forestier, a delectable medley of sautéed mushrooms, spinach, and garlic, topped with melted Gruyère cheese and creamy béchamel sauce, served on golden toasted sourdough bread.

name: Croque Saumon
description: Experience the taste of the sea with our Croque Saumon, a delightful combination of smoked salmon, tangy capers, and fresh dill, accompanied by melted Gruyère cheese and rich béchamel sauce, all served on crispy, toasted sourdough bread.

name: Croque Hawaiian
description: Add a touch of the tropics to your meal with our Croque Hawaiian, featuring juicy pineapple and savory Black Forest ham, topped with melted Gruyère cheese and creamy béchamel sauce, garnished with chives and served on toasted sourdough bread.

name: Croque Chèvre
description: Satisfy your taste buds with our Croque Chèvre, a delightful combination of creamy goat cheese, salty prosciutto, and peppery arugula, drizzled with a touch of honey and topped with béchamel sauce, served on golden toasted sourdough bread.

name: Croque Truffé
description: Indulge in the luxurious flavors of our Croque Truffé, featuring tender roast beef and sweet caramelized onions, smothered in a rich, truffle-infused béchamel sauce and melted Gruyère cheese, garnished with chives and served on crispy sourdough bread.

name: Croque Vegano
description: Catering to our plant-based friends, our Croque Vegano offers a delicious combination of grilled eggplant, roasted red peppers, and fresh basil, topped with melted vegan cheese and a creamy cashew béchamel sauce, served on toasted sourdough bread.
